pages.title: Misc building
pages.text: Here is a list of small crafting recipes you can use.

pages.title: Potted Plants
pages.text: You can now put more plants in pots. These include $(li)cocoa beans $(li)sugar cane $(li)berries $(li)sea pickles $(li)daisy $(li)long grass $(li)seed $(li)potato $(li)carrot $(li)melon $(li)pumkin $(li)beetroot
